About Me

A little about myself...

BIO

I have spent most my life gaming and following the next big thing in technology. Since I can remember, whenever I saw someone working with computers and writing code, I was fascinated. I've gone about and tried other things but something always drew me back to the idea of writing code and making something from nothing. Now i'm finally turning that in a reality. I had the opportunity to work on radios and various electronic systems while serving in the military. This has given me a solid foundation for problem solving, fast thinking, being able to adapt to any circumstance and still produce the best product I can in those circumstances. Now I am on a new path forging a career in Software Development. I don't know where it will lead me, but I am excited for the journey.

Microsoft Software and Systems Academy

Cloud Appication Development Student

January 2020 - May 2020

• 19 week course that involved working hands-on with C#, T-SQL, and ASP.NET MVC
• Collaborated and built several projects using ASP.NET MVC, C#, Azure, Visual Basic, and utilizing SQL database. such as: A music store and a Sports Store.

United States Marine Corps

Aviation Communication Systems Technician

February 2015 - January 2020

• Responsible for the matters pertaining to voice communications equipment, encryption devices, electronic assemblies and sub-assemblies, fiber optic cables, and system software for radios and telecommunications equipment used within the Marine Air Command and Control Systems (MACCS).
• Received a Certificate of Commendation for performance during a joint operation which required learning and implementing a form of communication between the Air Force and Marine Corps that had not been successfully used before.
• Held additional responsibilities such as:
• Head of Cryptographic Material - Oversaw accountability, documentation, and implementation of all Cryptographic assets.
• Head of Training – Tracked, documented, and issued all job-related training for the personal under designated section.
